attributes.action: Don’t put calories on food menus
attributes.additional_details: As someone who has been through anorexia, even when I’ve been recovered for nearly 2 year’s, I would (and so would so many other people) feel compelled to then chose my food and drink based on which has the least calories which could send me into a relapse, and can trigger other people into disordered eating who have never been through it also.
attributes.background: In current events, while mental health and more specifically eating disorders are such a huge problem, the government want to make it compulsory for restaurants, cafes and pubs to include calories on menus.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585685
